cards.question: 阿姨
meaning: woman of similar age to one's parents (term of address used by child)

cards.question: 把
meaning: particle marking the following noun as a direct object

cards.question: 北方
meaning: China north of the Yellow River

cards.question: 才
meaning: (preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until

cards.question: 词语
meaning: word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)

cards.question: 地
meaning: structural particle: used before a verb or adjective
linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

cards.question: 东
meaning: host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)

cards.question: 发烧
meaning: to have a high temperature (from illness)

cards.question: 方便
meaning: to make things easy for people

cards.question: 分
meaning: unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm

cards.question: 关系
meaning: variant of 關係|关系[guān xì]

cards.question: 讲
meaning: as far as sth is concerned

cards.question: 角
meaning: unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan

cards.question: 接
meaning: to take one's turn on duty

cards.question: 口
meaning: classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)

cards.question: 老
meaning: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity

cards.question: 马
meaning: horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess

cards.question: 普通话
meaning: Putonghua (common speech of the Chinese language)

cards.question: 其他
meaning: in addition to the person mentioned above

cards.question: 上网
meaning: to stretch a net (in a sports game or for covering sth)

cards.question: 使
meaning: to instruct sb to do sth

cards.question: 条
meaning: classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

cards.question: 位
meaning: classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)

cards.question: 相信
meaning: to be convinced (that sth is true)

cards.question: 兴趣
meaning: interest (thing in which one is interested)

cards.question: 一直
meaning: from the beginning of ... up to ...

cards.question: 站
meaning: branch of a company or organization

cards.question: 只
meaning: classifier for birds and certain animals
